languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
languages.original_text: Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength. Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they heal for 10% of missing wounds

traits.locale_text: The wielder suffers −40% less damage from psychic abilities. When the wielder suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away. If the target fails a Toughness test, it becomes prone for 1 round. Base armour property: +30 Strength.
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

Base armour property: +30 Strength.
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador mata a un enemigo, recupera tantas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} como el 10 % de las heridas que haya perdido. Propiedad básica de armadura: +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador mata a un enemigo, recupera tantas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} como el 10 % de las heridas que haya perdido. Propiedad básica de armadura: +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者击杀敌人时，都会恢复损失{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的10%。 基础护甲特性：+30{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者击杀敌人时，都会恢复损失{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的10%。 基础护甲特性：+30{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: Dès que le porteur élimine un adversaire, il récupère des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} équivalentes à 10 % de ses blessures manquantes. Propriété d'armure de base : +30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Dès que le porteur élimine un adversaire, il récupère des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} équivalentes à 10 % de ses blessures manquantes. Propriété d'armure de base : +30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: Tötet der Träger einen Gegner, regeneriert er {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe von 10 % seiner fehlenden Wunden. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tötet der Träger einen Gegner, regeneriert er {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} in Höhe von 10 % seiner fehlenden Wunden. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: 着用者が敵を殺すと、失っている{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の10%を回復する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}+30。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が敵を殺すと、失っている{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の10%を回復する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}+30。

languages.text: Убив противника, персонаж восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} на значение, равное 10% от своего недостающего здоровья. Базовое свойство: +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж убивает противника, он восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} на значение, равное 10% от его недостающего здоровья Базовое свойство: +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

На 40% сокращает получаемый урон от псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. При получении урона от псайкерской способности, поглощенная и перенаправленная энергия отбрасывает противников, находящихся на соседних клетках, на 2 клетки от персонажа. Отброшенные цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Базовое свойство: +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

Когда персонаж убивает противника, он восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} на значение, равное 10% от его недостающего здоровья Базовое свойство: +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
